sentences.en: And 10, Son will relay baton to the next generation of successors.
sentences.cn: 而10年后, 孙正义将把接力棒交给下一代接班人.

sentences.en: Five people were injured in the baton charge.
Have you requested extra baton training for her?
sentences.cn: 你有要求她接受额外的警棍训练 吗 ?

sentences.en: He once again raised his baton and brought in the brass.
sentences.cn: 他再次举起指挥棒，让铜管乐部加入进来。

sentences.en: In the gallery, the bandmaster, his baton poised, stood waiting for a signal.
sentences.cn: 音乐廊中, 乐队指挥举着指挥棒, 站在那儿等待发出信号.

sentences.en: Police in riot gear baton-charged the crowd.
sentences.cn: 暴乱中，警察挥舞着警棍对人群发起冲击。

sentences.en: The conductor beat time with a baton.
sentences.cn: 指挥用指挥棒打着拍子.

sentences.en: The drum majorette twirled her baton.
sentences.cn: 鼓乐队女队长快速地转动她的指挥棒.

sentences.en: The police made a baton charge.
sentences.cn: 警察用警棍将群众驱退.

sentences.en: The policeman used his baton to battle with the rascal.
sentences.cn: 警察用警棍和歹徒搏斗.

sentences.en: They threatened to baton him to death.
They were driven back by a police baton charge.
sentences.cn: 他们被警察用警棍赶了回去.

sentences.en: We can't dance to his baton.
sentences.cn: 我们不能跟他的指挥棒转.

sentences.en: With his baton the conductor was beating time.
sentences.cn: 指挥用指挥棒打着拍节.

sentences.en: With the baton the conductor was beating time.
sentences.cn: 乐队指挥用指挥棒打拍子.
